full_summary:
===============


**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

### Portable Pilotage Unit

**Reference:** cb-6801-50552238
**Amendment:** 2
**Solicitation:** Acquis-2023

**Tender Information**

*   **Publication Date**: July 4, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 28, 2023 at 7:00 PM Pacific Daylight Time

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Type:** [GD]
*   **Provision of:** Portable pilotage units
*   **Contract Duration:** Expected start date: October 1, 2023. Expected end date: September 30, 2028

### Procurement Information

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Highest combined rating of technical merit and price
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

### Specifications

*   **UNSPSC Code:** *32130000
*   **Description:** Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories

### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity:** Pacific Pilotage Authority
*   **Address:** 1000 - 1130 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC V6E4A4, Canada
*   **Contact Name:** Alan Wheatley
*   **Email:** acquis@ppa-app.gc.ca
*   **Telephone:** (604) 666-6771

**Documents and Attachments**

*   [Tender Notice] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6801/rfp-portable-pilotage-unit---addendum-1.pdf)
*   [Addendum] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6801/ddp-unite-de-pilotage-portable---addenda-1_0_0.pdf)

### Submission Requirements

*   **Submission Deadline:** July 28, 2023 at 7:00 PM Pacific Daylight Time
*   **Acceptance of Proposals:** Late proposals will not be accepted
